item.title: [scd] Elfhame Palace
item.description:
Land

Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [scd] Elemental Bond
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

item.title: [scd] Drumhunter
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid Warrior

At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 5 or greater, you may draw a card.

{T}: Add {C}.

item.title: [scd] Dredge the Mire
item.description:
Sorcery

Each opponent chooses a creature card in their graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [scd] Dream Pillager
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Dream Pillager deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from the top of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards.

item.title: [scd] Drakuseth, Maw of Flames
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dragon

Flying

Whenever Drakuseth, Maw of Flames attacks, it deals 4 damage to any target and 3 damage to each of up to two other targets.

item.title: [scd] Dragon Tempest
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of Dragons you control.

item.title: [scd] Dragonspeaker Shaman
item.description:
Creature — Human Barbarian Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

item.title: [scd] Dragon's Hoard
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.

{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [scd] Dragonmaster Outcast
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

item.title: [scd] Dragon Mage
item.description:
Creature — Dragon Wizard

Flying

Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

item.title: [scd] Dragonlord's Servant
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Shaman

Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [scd] Dragonkin Berserker
item.description:
Creature — Human Berserker

First strike

Boast abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate for each Dragon you control.

Boast — {4}{R}: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

item.title: [scd] Draconic Disciple
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Draconic Disciple: Create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

item.title: [scd] Distant Melody
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

item.title: [scd] Dismal Backwater
item.description:
Land

Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.

When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [scd] Disenchant
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [scd] Diregraf Captain
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Soldier

Deathtouch

Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [scd] Dimir Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {U}{B}.

item.title: [scd] Diluvian Primordial
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Flying

When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

item.title: [scd] Dictate of the Twin Gods
item.description:
Enchantment

Flash

If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

item.title: [scd] Dictate of Heliod
item.description:
Enchantment

Flash

Creatures you control get +2/+2.

item.title: [scd] Devouring Light
item.description:
Instant

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

Exile target attacking or blocking creature.

item.title: [scd] Demanding Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [scd] Deep Analysis
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws two cards.

Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [scd] Deadly Tempest
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. Each player loses life equal to the number of creatures they controlled that were destroyed this way.

item.title: [scd] Dawn of Hope
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

item.title: [scd] Dauntless Escort
item.description:
Creature — Rhino Soldier

Sacrifice Dauntless Escort: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Curse of Disturbance
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

item.title: [scd] Curse of Bounty
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Whenever enchanted player is attacked, untap all nonland permanents you control. Each opponent attacking that player untaps all nonland permanents they control.

item.title: [scd] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [scd] Crush Contraband
item.description:
Instant

Choose one or both —

• Exile target artifact.

• Exile target enchantment.

item.title: [scd] Cruel Revival
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [scd] Crucible of Fire
item.description:
Enchantment

Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.

item.title: [scd] Crippling Fear
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose a creature type. Creatures that aren't of the chosen type get -3/-3 until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Coveted Jewel
item.description:
Artifact

When Coveted Jewel enters the battlefield, draw three cards.

{T}: Add three mana of any one color.

Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of Coveted Jewel. Untap it.

item.title: [scd] Counterspell
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell.

item.title: [scd] Condemn
item.description:
Instant

Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

item.title: [scd] Conclave Tribunal
item.description:
Enchantment

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

item.title: [scd] Command Tower
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [scd] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [scd] Commander's Insignia
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.

item.title: [scd] Combustible Gearhulk
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

First strike

When Combustible Gearhulk enters the battlefield, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total mana value of those cards.

item.title: [scd] Collective Unconscious
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw a card for each creature you control.

item.title: [scd] Collective Blessing
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control get +3/+3.

item.title: [scd] Coastal Tower
item.description:
Land

Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

item.title: [scd] Cloudblazer
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

Flying

When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

item.title: [scd] Cleansing Nova
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy all creatures.

• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.

item.title: [scd] Clan Defiance
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one or more —

• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying.

• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying.

• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.

item.title: [scd] Citywide Bust
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.
